* This grasp is for an object with low weight.
* The object has an approximate mass of 500 grams.

* Based on object mass and friction coefficient, grasp should initially set the contact force to 8 Newtons.
* If the gripper slips, this grasp should increase the output force by 0.045 Newtons.

[end of description]
